articles.title: Coronavirus update: New sensor used for stroke patients could help spot symptoms earlier - Express
articles.description: CORONAVIRUS cases continue to rise daily. In that time, scientists and reserachers are doing all they can to help with the pandemic. A new device used on stroke patients could help to track symptoms and note the progression of the illness.
